channel.title: Small Multiples on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Small multiples
item.description: James Corriea, Jr. has this nice illustration of the use of small multiples in weather forecasting to show the progression of forecasts as they change. Day 1 outlook progression #wiwx #miwx #ilwx #ohwx #inwx pic.twitter.com/HtLJQ6lOq0 — james correia jr (@jimmyc42) August 2, 2015 Better Know a Visualization: Small Multiples from Juice Analytics has some more examples - the original goes back to the work of Edward Tufte.
